divs: Sighting Detailsmy grnadma was driving me too basketball practice when high in the sky i saw this trianguler object. me and my mom have saw this object on thanksgiving of 2011. it looked the same as the ones seen over belguim 1989-1990.it disrupted both of our cell phones it seemed to hover then go for a while and then i took my eye of the object for a second then it was gone. my grandma has bad eyesight so lost it after a while. a havent seen it since but expect to soon
Summary: it was trianguler with white lights and a blinking red light in the middle
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around February 1st 2012
